name: New Yam Festival (Iri Ji)
description: Celebrates the yam harvest, a major event in Igbo culture.

name: Biafra Remembrance Day
description: Honors those who died in the Nigerian Civil War (Biafran War).

name: Ofala Festival
description: Celebrates the king (Obi/Igwe) and his reign in various Igbo towns.

name: Mmanwu Festival
description: Masquerade festival, honoring ancestors and spirits.

name: Ekpe Festival
description: Secret society festival, especially in Arochukwu and some Igbo communities.

name: Aju Festival
description: Women's festival, especially in some parts of Anambra.

name: Ofala Festival (Njiko na Ntachi)
description: Celebrates the king (Obi/Igwe) and his reign in Onitcha.
